name: How to Library
description:
Best practices for Library editors.


Do you work with a small team of designers who manage a big Library on which other teams depend on? Big responsibility! Does your team have a Library but sometimes have problems with unintended detaches or outdated components?


In this file I've collected the most basic best practices for any editor of a Team Library. From Component editing techniques to documentation ideas, all the way to advanced features like moving Main Components between Libraries and, of course, Branching.
